A4.text: The 48th Academy Awards were presented on March 29, 1976, at the Dorothy Chandler Pavilion in Los Angeles, California.

A5.text: Miloš Forman's One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest made a 'clean sweep' of the five major categories: Best Picture, Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Director and Best Screenplay (Adapted).

A6.text: Nicholson won Academy Awards for Best Actor for playing Randle McMurphy in One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)

A7.text: Miloš Forman's One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest made a 'clean sweep' of the five major categories: Best Picture, Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Director and Best Screenplay (Adapted)
